website_summaries.verdict: Extra bright light makes this model worth considering despite some quality and longevity concerns.
pros: A good choice for very dark settings, thanks to the 1500 lumens
Great for use around the house during blackouts
Also has 3 other light settings for when need dimmer light
cons: Some of the parts feel flimsy, including the battery door that's prone to jamming or breaking

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised -- Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was advertised as providing very bright light. It does. The electricity in my house went out for several hours last night. I popped in four D-cell batteries and turned the lantern on to its brightest setting. It put out an amazing amount of light. I was able to read comfortably with the light it provided -- unlike most camp lanterns, which are rather dim. Also unlike most competing products, it was easy to insert the batteries. Very satisfying. One warning: At the lantern's brightest setting (it has four), the batteries only last for about six hours. Keep some extra D-cell batteries in reserve.
customer_reviews.author: elvenkind

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open.  Cheap inner parts.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to put brand new, freshly charged rechargeable batteries in it. It was so difficult to manage, that two little "guide posts" (on right in photo) actually broke off, and I'm not a strong person. The light would not go on, so when I took the cover back off, as you can see, the springs, on small metal plates, had come completely off of where they belong. I tried to put them back, but the turning of the lid bent them badly. I'm sending it back as defective.
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This product appeared to be exactly what I needed. I just tried to insert batteries and it was difficult to open the base. Got the batteries in and now is will not close. After double checking the batteries to make sure they were not preventing base from closing, a tiny screw fell out of the base. You can have this thing back and refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne

customer_reviews.title: to hold the lamp inverted in a tent just pops off easily. You should hang it by the bail
customer_reviews.text: About the only con on this light is the size. It takes 4 "D" batteries in the base, so plan accordingly. The hanging hook on the base, to hold the lamp inverted in a tent just pops off easily. You should hang it by the bail. This is a heavy, bulky unit. Not for the backpacking camper. But as far as *light* is concerned, it is a fantastic unit that will outshine a Coleman Propane dual mantle light. You can dim in several steps if you want less light or you want to conserve batteries. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Good price point but overall poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this product for one year and a half. Very bright, a good replacement for a gas lantern because it runs cool and is very sturdy and doesn’t break when dropped. However the build quality of this product is very poor, the hook at the bottom of the lantern broke recently. The bottom of the lantern is difficult to open and close to replace the batteries. One of the posts that is connected to the lid also broke. This has been consistent with the quality of most Chinese products at low price points.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Scalia

customer_reviews.title: Your neighbors will wonder why you still have power and they don't!!!
customer_reviews.text: On the lowest setting, you should get 200 hours of light (over 8 days!). On the brightest setting, don't look without eye protection. Ok, maybe some leftover "eclipse glasses" could come in handy. Really, really bright! A handle to carry with and a hook in the base, tucked away until needed, to hang it. Well made. Perfect for camp. Use it during a power outage and your neighbors will wonder why you still have power and they don't!!!
customer_reviews.author: hereistand

customer_reviews.title: THANK You for delivering on time before Hurricane Irma hit.
customer_reviews.text: Lights up large room with a nice soft glow. Not too bright, not too soft. Used it for the 6 days without power after hurricane Irma. Bought several other next day Amazon prime items for the Hurricane too prepare for Irma. This item arrived before the Hurricane as guaranteed. Fortunately the batteries I order for it also arrived before the storm. Everything else I ordered did not arrive till days after power returned. I have faith inn this company and will continue to buy items as needed from them.
customer_reviews.author: JPgrossman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the mountains of central PA, our power goes off frequently. When you find yourself sitting in the dark with no entertainment, the hours crawl by! I've had different lamps that were similar-looking to this one, but this is a stand-out. After putting in the 4 "D" batteries, I turned it on and was almost blinded by the light. Like standing under an alien ship when it turns the ol' high beams on you! Fortunately, this lamp has more than one level of brightness. I'll have no problem reading by its light, or crocheting, knitting, etc. What a gem! I'm going to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: pattyb

customer_reviews.title: Inoperative after 1 year of little use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lantern from Amazon in July 2019 and used it once for a couple of hours during a power outage. Since then, it sat on a shelf undisturbed until today July 30, 2020. It no longer works. I changed the batteries, double checked everything and all that happens is the light flashes dimly for one second and then nothing - no light of any kind. The lantern is undamaged, no breaks, no scratches. It looks new out of the box. I contacted the company on it's website but have not heard back. I cannot recommend. If they replace the lantern with the same value I will amend this review.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product
customer_reviews.text: This case of the product seems sturdy but the fittings to the batteries are so poorly made that they simply will not stay in place when the cover is screwed back on. The fittings bend, lose their shape, and are so flimsy that one expects them to fall apart with a third try. So, I am returning it rather than have the fittings fall apart. I read but discounted some earlier reviews where the problem was reported. Very poor product. Replaced this product with a far superior Monomax LED Camping Lantern Battery Powered 1500 Lumens. Pardon the pun, but the quality is night and day!
customer_reviews.author: Joan V. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Blazin' BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I just reviewed another I love also that costs quite a bit more, and all in all, I have to say, this equals the other as a favorite. It is SO bright I almost look forward to a power outage to make the neighbors think we still have power. It will also deter any thieves during outages. It does light up the room. My advice is to hold it high when you first turn it on so you won't be seeing dots all night. I love it, got one for myself, one for my Sister in a package I sent with security alarms I purchased on Amazon, and am on to get another. I'd love one for every room!
customer_reviews.author: SRF

customer_reviews.title: Did not save the day, broke before we could use
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I tested it great! When I went to use the second time when we were in need, some small plastic pieces broke and now its unusable. Update...It was replaced soon after, tested then stored. Went to use it a for another emergency and it isnt working. I stored it with no batteries, used 2 sets of batteries to test and still no use. UNRELIABLE PRODUCT DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very solid lantern. Several levels of brightness with the lowest setting very nice to read by. Has handle on the top and an extra hook on the bottom. Battery compartment much easier to use than my last lantern. I can actually open it without help from my husband
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kay

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations! :)
customer_reviews.text: We had an earthquake 5.8 in our area (biggest since 1995). Not sure that's why the power went out for a bit, but I thought it would be good to have a battery operated lantern, for emergency purposes. This lantern exceeded my expectations! I love the four settings, the fourth being the brightest. It truly does light an entire room! And it definitely would serve an entire family if the power were to go out for an extended period of time. Great company! Great service!
customer_reviews.author: phlorra

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Because of my experience with the first, I purchased a second. The battery life is long - I am not sure how long because we are on the first set of batteries. The electricity went out a few times in our home and it was used extensively because we were entertaining. We also took it camping overnight and still the same battery. The light is very bright and the unit is lightweight and portable. Liked is so well we decided to buy another
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Blazin is an understatement!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting for the 800 lumens to be back in stock but these came out instead. During a recent power outage I was able to read by this light on the second brightest setting for over 5 hours. Did exactly what I bought it for. I would not buy this without the frosted lens. You do not want to look straight at it-too bright. But great for on a side table or overhead.
customer_reviews.author: RI Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: We needed to get a lantern for very occasional use. We would use it during a power outage which does not happen very often or camping which also does not happen very often. The lamp on the brightest setting is adequate. I like that it has two other settings in case we have to conserve the batteries. Since these are LED's I assume they will be very efficient. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Buff

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY bright!
customer_reviews.text: I received this very quickly and when I arrived, I immediately put in the batteries and turned it on. WOW! They were right! It is very bright and will light up a whole room easily. Where we live our electricity is always going out for one reason or another, so this will come in handy in the evenings when we are sitting here in the dark with only some candles to see by.
customer_reviews.author: Carotopgal

customer_reviews.title: WOW, do not look directly at the light
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very bright, bought it after my last camping trip as we got there late and had to setup in the dark. The lights we had did not do the trick. Got this put the batteries in and tested it in a 14 by 14 room and it lit it up extremely well. Looking forward to using this on our next outing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product, so I have really no way of knowing battery life. I do like the four levels of brightness, and the brightest is really really bright! The only negative, and it’s a very minor one, is that it requires a feat of strength and dexterity to get the cover back on after inserting the batteries. Snug is an understatement.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fliegel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful super bright lantern with frosted shade!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lantern as it is super bright but doesn’t hurt my eyes thanks to the frosted shade. It has several settings so if you need less brightness the batteries will last longer. All of the settings except for the lowest are much brighter than my 13 year old Coleman fluorescent tube lanterns. I love this lantern as I lose power several times a year. I also bought their 600 lumen solar chargeable lantern in case I were to run out of batteries during a longer power outage. I am very happy with this company’s lanterns!
customer_reviews.author: slz

customer_reviews.title: Very BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this light for emergency use during power outages. This lamp can be extremely bright on its highest setting. I doubt we will need to use it much on that setting, but I am glad it is available. For us, it is best used on one of the middle settings. The lowest setting makes a good night light. We have not had a chance to use it through a power outage yet, nor have we used it long enough to report on battery life. Overall, we are pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TLW

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is much lighter, smaller, and Brighter than I expected. It is excellent for camping, hurricanes, power outage, etc...and really provides enough light to see your way around. I had a lantern that I thought was very bright and hoped this one would equal it, but this lantern turned out to be at least twice as bright as the old one. I'd recommend it to anyone needing an emergency or camping lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this lantern!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where the power goes out for a few hours or even overnight. When it happens when it is dark, this lantern will be perfect; it gives off great light. It will light up a room like a small lightbulb and the light is consistent. I don't know about the battery life yet, but the product says up to 200 hours on the dimmest set. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D.Moder

customer_reviews.title: Goes on and off
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with something rattling inside. Every time I move it the lights go on and off. Very irritating.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Lousy shipping received too late
customer_reviews.text: The lantern is very nice and well constructed. The only reason I gave 3 stars is the shipping. I have a prime account and this item took 8 days to get here. I ordered this item in case we lost power during our recent hurricane and it should have arrived in at least three days. We did not loose power but this arrived after the hurricane past us. Very disappointed in their shipping, it is really lousy.
customer_reviews.author: angelfish

customer_reviews.title: extreamly bright, bought it because there were a number ...
customer_reviews.text: extreamly bright, bought it because there were a number of power outages during our rainy season, but wouldn't you know, the outages stopped, but I will be well prepared next time
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 1 hour--Unreliable Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lantern based on previous reviews, but looks like those reviews are fake/bought. This lantern stopped working within 1 hour of use; and then when I tried to change the batteries, the whole thing just fell apart. Literally, the plastic cracked open, and everything just disintegrated. Absolute piece of garbage...this is some cheap chinese rubbish which is selling because perhaps seller is great at managing Amazon reviews. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M Cristo

customer_reviews.title: It is Bright
customer_reviews.text: It is bright and easy to use. We just purchased our second Light. One for upstairs and one for downstairs in case of a power outage. The number and intensity of hurricanes has increased the last few years in North Carolina
customer_reviews.author: Majic

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly small and lightweight, yet very bright!
customer_reviews.text: My old LED lantern (which takes 8 D batteries) is nowhere near as good as this. This 1500 lumens light is very bright and only needs 4 D batteries. The build quality is very good and it feels durable. I had no issues attaching and removing the battery compartment lid. Perfect for power outages and night time fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: The one you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: We had been looking for a good solid lantern for years, only finding dinky ones that weren't very powerful. Main function was to use during power outages, to avoid having to light some 10 or so candles. This lantern is fantastic! It lights up a room quite nicely and can be dimmed. Haven't had a power outage yet, but my kids have been playing with it and it's been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1028

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery; I could not be more impressed with this lantern. Lightweight but sturdy and very user friendly. I purchased for use during power outages with the hurricane season upon us. Set it up last night and the lights work great. I'm so impressed that I may purchase a 2nd one. I just have to remember to keep extra D batteries on hand."
customer_reviews.author: Makeupmanic

customer_reviews.title: Good Light
customer_reviews.text: I just received the lantern and am about to embark upon a two week or longer camping trip. Without having used it for it's intended purpose I can only say that it was well packaged, arrived quickly and in mint condition, seems to be well made, and definitely is powerful enough to light my small backyard. I expect it to be an excellent choice and if needed will revise this incomplete review after using it and returning from my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Morris

customer_reviews.title: The brightest lantern I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of lanterns and when the lights go out, they just aren't bright enough for me to read. This one does a fantastic job of lighting up the entire room
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: This is the brightest Lamp I have ever found.
customer_reviews.text: Anyone needing a good lamp-------This is the one. I almost got blinded when I turned it on the first time after installing the batteries - A MUST have. On a blackout, if you had one of these, it can light up an entire room. I liked it so much that I bought a second lamp to give to my niece who recently moved out to live independently.
customer_reviews.author: BMG

customer_reviews.title: Flexible light in an LED emergency lighting
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great little lamp that will help get through the Blackouts in California. I like the quality of the light and the ability to adjust the intensity which my other lights don't have. Haven't really used it as I just received it but if the battery is as represented I will be thrilled. Easy to set up, came well packed and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Movie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: "Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Easily slipped in the batteries (not included-you need 4 D batteries) and the was it. Puts out plenty of light to read by or walk to restroom if you were camping. Lights a decent sized area. I think it would be a rare occasion you would need to use the brightest setting. Happy with my purchase."
customer_reviews.author: JessJess

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the right purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am getting ready for the hurricane season. I purchased these and they are great. I purchased two of them but only one can light up the whole room. You really get what you pay for. They are lightweight, and you can hang them upside down or right side up. One of my better purchases lately.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy Lantern
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Blazin Sun 800 I have purchased. We use them after a big storm when the power goes off. Over the years I have purchased several other lanterns which I still use, but I have found this brand to be the best. I like also that it has several levels of brightness you can change it to. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: set

customer_reviews.title: Part of my Hurricane supplies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific lantern to include in your hurricane preparedness kit, or for any home with spotty electric service. Four light levels, hang or sit on table. In particular, the base is rubberized so it remains in place. 10 inches tall, LED light box about 2 inches, makes a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Dautell

customer_reviews.title: bright with 3 lower levels but misses ship date
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had an occasion to use this but it appears to be a good product. Only time will tell. I had problems getting this product as they changed the ship date on me 3 times! Was supposed to arrive in 2 days but that order was changed to 10 days then 2 weeks. Not what I consider PRIME which was whet this was ordered under.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse McCoy

customer_reviews.title: The Best and Brightest!
customer_reviews.text: Best lantern for very bright light. I bought this for use when the power goes out. My mom has vision loss from macular degeneration and light is essential for her. Her power went out and flashlights just didn't cut it. On the brightest setting, it's like a 100 watt lightbulb or more. I'm going to buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ipodcrazy

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Quick Prime delivery. This light is really bright and I love the ability to hang it. The brightness can be adjusted to the perfect light option. I have two other lanterns and this is by far the brightest.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This light is so bomb. Charge solar or use batteries. It's light weight so if you needed to put it on a pack or carry it no issue, but got that cool handle that rotates so you can hook it to anything! love this thing. I will likely order a few more as my son has absconded with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lantern exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Living in Houston we often suffer prolonged electricity outages due to severe weather and hurricanes. The lantern lights up the whole room and replaces a drawer full of old flashlights. I haven’t had to put the batteries to a longevity test but assume your claims of length are as true as everything else you say about your product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. White

customer_reviews.title: It delivers as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality product with advertised illumination. Time will tell on battery life but so far it seems good
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great light for big rooms
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for lighting a large or small space. Love this lantern. Had no power for 8 days during Hurricane Irma and this light was sufficient to light a big room. No more need to carry a smaller light around. Uses 4 D batteries so make sure you order them too if you don't have any on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for the upcoming hurricane season
customer_reviews.text: Living in Florida, the beginning of the hurricane season, which starts June 1st, I start to prep for possible power outages etc. and this Lantern will definitely come in handy. The light is bright, the lantern is light weight. Exactly as described. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bjelkie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gift so we haven’t used it, but we put batteries in it and are amazed at how much light it produces. We bought the first one for a gift and liked it so much we bought one for ourselves. We can place this between our kitchen and family room and it lights them both. You can have as bright a light or as subdued a light as you like with the multi settings.
customer_reviews.author: CMat

customer_reviews.title: good emergency light
customer_reviews.text: This is a good emergency light when you loose power during a storm. The only problem with the lamp we received was a very difficult switch operation. It was hard to operate but got better after many off/on operations.
customer_reviews.author: dave71203

customer_reviews.title: Great hurricane lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest hurricane lamp that I ever bought. It's so bright that it will light up an entire room when you turn it on high. The D cell batteries are great instead recharging a battery even when you're not using it. I'd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: A Storm Must Have!!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver. We lost power for 4 days after Hurricane Michael. If we had not had these lanterns, we we would have had a hard time. We were thankful at how well they worked and how reliable they were.
customer_reviews.author: mattypsmom

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lantern with long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is outstanding, several brightness settings, batteries last forever seems like. You can get it with a frost or clear lense. I bought both, and think they are both great, with frost giving more even light.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ehrnst

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a blackout
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this in preparation for local blackouts. It's very bright at the highest setting, and easy to change the brightness level. Also easy to change batteries. Looks great; love the fact that it can be hang up.Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Morris

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply designed and built
customer_reviews.text: As many have said this is extremely cheaply built in regards to the battery housing - took care and loaded batteries and pushed lid down fully and twisted to lock.... and still the internal thin splines that align the battery lid fractured. Can get it locked with difficulty, but I won’t be taking batteries out between usage as one should to preserve the connections! Bummer
customer_reviews.author: BrianB

customer_reviews.title: Really bright
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for occasional use when our electricity goes out. It is so much brighter than the one we had been using and it really does light up the whole room. It seems durable, very practical and economical. Now there is no need to worry about the batteries running low during a power outage.
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Product as described, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good color, able to see in dim light, very bright, easy to handle. Purchased for grandchildren in different state for hurricane season. Thankfully, they did not have to use. Would purchased again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lamp to have for hurricane season. It is fairly well-made too. If power goes out during a storm or hurricane, I would prefer this lamp to the cheap junky lower priced alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Steve MBSC

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk - Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once and took the batteries out afterwards. The springs/metal pieces to keep the batteries in place (which are necessary to make it work) bent and came off when I tried to replace the batteries. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha McBride

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in anticipation of the hurricane. We turned it on in our crawlspace and it worked fine for the first two hours, then just went out. We tried changing batteries, (even though they were new), etc. but it would never turn back on. Really disappointed - returned it
customer_reviews.author: Martha E. Marion

customer_reviews.title: Solid and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, very bright light with different settings. The lantern feels very solid. I do not know about the battery life because I just got it. I live in hurricane country and needed something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Mena Bielow

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting
customer_reviews.text: I got this in expectation of hurricanes during this hurricane season down here in Florida and it has impressed me greatly. In previous occasions when the power went out there was a struggle having a flashlight or lamp to light up the room. This lamp lights up the whole living room and more! It's great!! It's worth the price for times of emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Garrido

customer_reviews.title: WOW what a light
customer_reviews.text: Night fish only. WOW what a light. Tired of the propane lantern, gas lantern, kerosene lantern and so gave this led lantern a shot. Several different settings, and bright as a star. Well worth the price. Batteries last and last and last. Great lantern!
customer_reviews.author: R. Logue

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of light
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, operate and a very bright light with choices of brightness. Great for lighting emergencies such as power outages due to hurricanes, etc. Well constructed and very easy to install batteries. I love these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Villani

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Lantern
customer_reviews.text: 360 degrees of light. Bright as the sun. Four levels of brightness. Single button easy to press. Solidly built. Looks nice. Easy to carry. Well thought out design. Confident this will provide plenty of illumination during any power failure. Bring it on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cardonick

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised. The base is a little hard to put back on after putting in batteries but I'm impressed with the light. Looks pretty sturdy. Bought to use for power failure. Not fancy but I think it was money well spent. Might use in my yard this summer. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Paduch

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Purchased primarily for camping but will also use for lighting during outages. Especially like the four brightness levels, quite bright on high. Battery insertion easy and that design seems sufficiently robust. Have not had the opportunity to test battery usage claims. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for power outages
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Ordered after last power outage when we realized our old lanterns just weren’t bright enough for reading. This thing is bright! Will definitely light up a room and be able to read. But really like how the brightness can be adjusted. Seems solid and well made. Plan on buying more to replace all our old ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lantern.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the lantern, and that it is lightweight. The different settings for brightness is very good. The brightest setting is very powerful and sheds lots of light all around the room. It is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and super bright on highest setting. Good thing the cover is frosted. I like the dimmer settings. I gave 3 stars for battery life because instill haven't tested it. All in all, great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: USMC Grunt

customer_reviews.title: Received the lantern today
customer_reviews.text: "Excellent product. I bought one and liked it so well I bought another one. Light output on high is about like a 75W light bulb. Don't know about battery life but they say it is about 2 hours on high and about 200 hours on low."
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S. York

customer_reviews.title: Very bright lantern
customer_reviews.text: The lantern truly is very bright. I just wish the battery compartment was easier to access. Otherwise I would give it 5 stars. I haven't used it long enough to tell how long the batteries last.
customer_reviews.author: Vessie310

customer_reviews.title: just got it but so far love it---seems to be very well made with higher end ...
customer_reviews.text: just got it but so far love it---seems to be very well made with higher end materials. Wish it was made in the USA,but not so. one thing though, when you put fresh batteries in it and turn it on the instructions say do not look at the lite, well they mean it!!!! The cool thing is ,is the reason ya bought it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lou drinka, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lantern!
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is sturdy and the light is VERY powerful. I love that there are several grades of light from high to low,, and that it just takes 4 D batteries - which usually last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bronstein

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time. Shipping box was fine but the product box was open. There should have been more packing to keep the item from being tossed around in the box. Luckily no apparent damage to the lantern although it looks like it may have been returned by someone else. There were numerous smudges and finger prints on it that required cleaning. The lantern itself worked great and the dimmer switch is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sue&Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Light!
customer_reviews.text: This light is truly amazing...It is extremely bright (enough to light my 25' x 15' room) and I am able to read comfortably by it. The light may be used as a table lamp or it can be hung from above. No expensive batteries are needed here because it uses 4 cell batteries. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Good illuminator
customer_reviews.text: Very good illumination compared to previously owned battery lanterns. Construction and engineering of clamp on battery compartment leaves something to be desired. Doubt this will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L

customer_reviews.title: Blazin’ good lamp!
customer_reviews.text: A very convenient light with a very strong light output. My wife brought another brand but same type, Blazin out performed the other easily.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Nice lantern
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I used when the ceiling fan light in my bedroom refused to turn on. I've used it in my She-shed till electricity was hooked up. Good for camping and anywhere you need light and don't have it. I LOVE that you just flip a switch and you have light.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I like the 4 different levels of brightness. We just have the electricity go out and this will work in our great room very well. Takes 4 D batteries and is somewhat misleading on the life of the brightness - it made it sound like the longest life was at the highest level and that isn’t actuate - it is at the lowest level. I do not know how long it will last if left on the highest or brightest level but assume for the next storm it will be fine for the number of hours we will need it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lamps! Perfect for living off grid. Very bright light and has varied light settings. Easy to hang from the handle. Handle to hang from the bottom broke right away but we found it very inconvenient to hang from the bottom. Easily lights an entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bought for winter storms
customer_reviews.text: Whow bright, great high low, lights an twenty-five X thirty room !!!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit and Joyce Naahel u Hi.

customer_reviews.title: Really bright light
customer_reviews.text: Received the lanterns and have not had a need to use, but in testing them, the lights are super bright, love the feature of choosing from 4 lighting levels and the two methods of hanging (top/bottom hooks) or can use as a floor standing unit. When I use them, I can provide another review based on actual usage, but happy with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Securing the bottom after battery replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Step 3 of the battery Installation instructions seems misleading. I thought I followed the instructions but ended up breaking of the vanes on the guide post and twisting the base cap. However, both of the vanes broke off. Replacing the base cap seems to be more difficult than it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Ede

customer_reviews.title: Best camping led light
customer_reviews.text: Best camping lantern available for the price. Amazing led lights with 4 different settings. A must have if you are a camper or anything outdoors! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use during power outages. Easy to install batteries and easy operation. A nice card with all instructions was included. Light is bright and adjustable. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great lantern
customer_reviews.text: I bought an older model of this lantern a few years ago. It used individual LEDs and it still works great. I went looking for another so we’d have 2 for power outages. I found this newer version based on COB LED panels and I’m happy to say it works every bit as well. Maybe better. It’s a little pricy but easiest the brightest lantern we own.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, easy it operate and cannot comment on battery life as the battery are still work after many nights of use.
customer_reviews.author: jamie walker

customer_reviews.title: Battery Cover design is Nuts.
customer_reviews.text: Spent more than 45 minutes trying to put the battery cover back on. The plastic center guide post cracked and fell off. Never got to use product since could not get battery cover to screw on correctly. The electric metal contacts on the cover bent. Battery installation should be EASY and take less than 5 seconds - not on this lantern. This product should be redesigned, especially the battery cover.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpai

customer_reviews.title: Great valve and very good lantern would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Earthquake kit we're putting together. Used over Halloween decorations under a huge tree was amazed the light it puts out. It has different levels of light.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Bright bright bright, don't look directly into the light if its on full strength. Glad I got this because where I live it takes nothing for us to loose power. Thinking of getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Lantern But Light So Intensly Blaring
customer_reviews.text: Ordered soft white lighting but it glares out at me. Could be cause of my senior aged eyes. Not comfortable reading by it or having it at eye level. It does give enough light to a room to be OK in power outage, Lantern sturdy easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: NC Gal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brightness!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, who's electricity keeps going out! She only had a tiny little flashlight. This one lights up the entire living room and she absolutely loves it! It can also be dialed down so it's not so bright!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Best Lantern Around
customer_reviews.text: This Is The Best Lantern I Have Ever Owned. I Highly Recommend This Light Where Power Outages Might Occur. I Made The Right Decision To Purchase It. GREAT JOB!!! BEAUTIFUL PRODUCT!!! Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Needs Better Engineering
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the smaller 500 (green) lumen unit which is fine. The larger 800 (blue) lantern came without instructions and I found that removing the base to load the batteries was difficult and more difficult to screw back on. The base has locks and a keyhole pin that have to be aligned. After several cycles the lantern would not work. I have returned the unit without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: matherman

customer_reviews.title: Not 1500 lumens!!
customer_reviews.text: Not 1500 lumens! The 700 lumen rechargable lantern from Wal-Mart is much brighter. But I need one that uses batteries rather than depending on electricity to charge. I will keep it. But I am very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chopper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lights up 2 whole rooms!  :  )
customer_reviews.text: "Little lamp is wonderful. Super bright multiple levels. I am highly satisfied! No worries next time hurricane season comes around ,...love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Bright to less bright lantern that gives great light
customer_reviews.text: If you want a lantern for camping, or for because darkness terrifies you in a blackout, or both.... this is the lantern for you. Blinding when you are scared, subtle for when you are hanging out in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wigington

customer_reviews.title: It has four different lumen settings.  The 800 lumen setting will light an entire room!
customer_reviews.text: Great lantern. It use 4 D batteries instead of 3, so it should last longer. The best thing is that there 4 different power settings for any occasion. I bought the one with the clear shade and I would warn people to be careful and not look at the lantern, especially on the 800 lumen setting. However, it will light an entire room at that setting. I do plan on buying a second lantern for use inside the house, but I will be getting the one with the frosted shade. Great lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Honest Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I received this lantern and the light flickered and it was not 1500 Lumens, so my review was less than favorable. The vendor was gracious enough to make good on his sale by sending me a replace at no cost to me. That is truly a person of integrity. Thank You,
customer_reviews.author: alfred
